title: Stevia tunguraguensis
text: Stevia tunguraguensis is a species of <a href="flowering%20plant">flowering plant</a> in the family <a href="Asteraceae">Asteraceae</a>. It is found only in <a href="Ecuador">Ecuador</a>. Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a> is subtropical or tropical moist <a href="montane%20forest">montane forest</a>s. It is threatened by <a href="habitat%20loss">habitat loss</a>.
